name: Impatient Hero
description:
Alva the mage is on a quest to save the world, and they'll be damned if any flaming skull or feeble slimeball is going to stand in their way. The problem is, these monsters are very much capable of killing them. Use your own magic to assist the overly stubborn saviour of our universe by teleporting them away from danger.

Controls

The only button used in this game is the spacebar. Alva will continue to walk foward every couple of seconds unless you hold down space, causing Alva to be teleported backwards.

Mechanics

Flying skulls and slimes will both kill Alva, resetting the current room.

Glowing doors act as portals, teleporting Alva between them.

Arrows will point Alva in their respective directions.

Credits

Almost all art and assets created by Ansimuz and available to purchase here (https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/tiny-rpg-dungeon/)
